"A.P.242/3/10 10:15": "...<%me>. Where are we...?"
"This is Kakuriyo. A land situated in the divide between our world and the next."
"Sukuna-hime! You're alright...!"
"But, the other Shironians were..."
"Ever the quick one to jump to conclusions, thou art. Matoi, looketh around thee."
"...Huh? Kotoshiro?"
"Yes, it has been a while. There are others too, gathered beyond here."
"Thou mayest think of this as our emergency sanctuary. While 'tis a sacred place, our intrusion is a necessity."
"Lady Sukuna-hime was quick to sense the arrival of the tyrannical one, and relocated everyone here to Kakuriyo."
"Not everyone was saved. Even I am not that all-powerful. The sacrifices were... many."
"Still, 'tis far better than the fate the Kuronites met. Ahah."
"If we had only come sooner..."
"The blame is not thine. Had thee arrived earlier, the outcome would remain largely unchanged."
"That rogue bears incredible power. Thou would... no, I fear even I would pale in comparison."
"Now speaketh. Telleth me all thou know of this being."
"I see. It was those who bore the ARKS. They gave rise to something extraordinary."
"That's what Xiao told us. Shiva's power comes from their near-infinite Photon abilities."
"We thought if you... If you used the Braided Ash Formation to seal her... we might stand a chance."
"An idea befitting that child. Thou hatch'd a similar scheme to bind Matoi's powers when she went berserk."
"Mine power, and the Photons thou useth. They bear some similarity, so thou could'st make use of it."
"...Very well. Wouldst thou accept a request of mine?"
"Anything."
"What do you need?"
"Sure. We'll help however we can!"
"...Ahah, what earnest sincerity."
"Kotoshiro."
"Yes."
"For thee I have a separate task."
